name: Up The Security
description:
Defend The bank!

But where do you get Money from? The Thieves, Of Course! Theyll leave a trail of coins on the way to the safe. But if they get arrested - No More Money!

Guards cost 15 $! 

Although The Thieves give you Money if undisturbed, Dont leave them alone for too long, as theyll upgrade their equipment and will gain More lifes.

if 3 Thieves Make it to the safe, you Lose!

Survive for as long as you can! 

Thanks for Playing!

(Unfortunately, no audio.)
